scripts.compact: source $HOME/.local/bin/env && compact compile src/TestToken.compact src/managed/TestToken && compact compile src/ZkId.compact src/managed/ZkId && compact compile src/LiquidityPool.compact src/managed/LiquidityPool
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && cp -Rf ./src/managed ./dist/managed && cp ./src/TestToken.compact ./dist && cp ./src/ZkId.compact ./dist && cp ./src/LiquidityPool.compact ./dist
